1�Hmm hmm hmmm...This seems tooo be...
1�Oooh!It's  $����! Yooo can have it now.
1�Her Magnificence the Empress is safely shielded now, and it is all thanks to your efforts. You have the makings of a her
o.�The mercenaries and the Imperial Army shall fight and perish as one to shield the Empress from harm!
1�May Her Magnificence reign a thousand years!
1�My presence was all for naught... My failure to protect the Astral Candescence is a transgression worthy of a thousand deaths...
1�Hear my plea... You mercenaries may be all that I can trust. Recover the Astral Candescence and bring it safely back to Al Zahbi...I implore you!

1�Ah,  �[/Private Second Class /Private First Class /Superior Private /Lance Corporal /Corporal /Sergeant /Sergeant Major /Chief Sergeant /Second Lieutenant /First Lieutenant /Captain ] !It is reassuring indeed to have such a mighty ally to aid in the defense of Al Zahbi.
1�I am honored to fight at your side in the name of Her Magnificence!
1� , is it?This should please you.
..�You are a mercenary, are you?
1�Hmph, filthy money-grubbers.Those who are controlled by money are eventually betrayed by it.
1�Damn those spineless Imperial soldiers! How could they let the Astral Candescence slip out right under their very noses!?
1�...Hm?You! Yes, you! What do you think you're staring at, anyway? Go get the Astral Candescence back, and now!
1�Ugh, you again. I have no patience for the mercenary mentality.
1�But you do show some skill in battle.I'll give you that much,  ...
1�Oh, I rrremember you.Here, this is for yo
u.�I-I'm not thanking you for anything. Don't get the wrrrong idea. This is just to cover the costs of your journe
y.�Leave me alone. I can't stand merrrcenaries.
1�Just make sure you don't get in our way when we're rrripping up the battlefield.
1�How am I going to get out of this...? The...the...Astral Candescence... What'll I tell the Empress...?
1�...What!? I don't need you merrrcenaries' help. I could take the Astral Candescence back with both hands tied behind my back!
1�Hmph, just because you think you know a thing or two about me now doesn't mean I like you.
1�I am a generrral. You are a mercenary.Rrremember your station.
1�What do you want, mercenary?I've got no time to chatter with the likes of you.
1�Elder Nadeey sent you?
1�You're serrrious about having this chat, aren't you?
1�Aydeewa Subterrane.Wait there until I finish my duties.
1�Oh, and if you bring  $���� with you, I might even think about talking to you!
1�Hey, you're the �[man/woman] who braved the beastmen to save me earlier, aren't you? Thank you! This is for yo
u.�When the beastmen invade, make sure you get behind us while we decimate the enemy. We wouldn't want you getting hurt now, would we?
1�Gahahaha!
1�Damn, we lost bad, didn't we? They even managed to take the Astral Candescence... But it's times like these...
1�Gahahaha!...that we should laugh in the face of fate and take back what's ours!
1�Oho, it's you!This battle will be over in time for lunch, then.I hate to miss a meal!
1�Gahahaha!
1�Thanks to your heroic rescue, I was able to safely return to my post. I would like to show you my gratitude with this gif
t.�We Serpent Generals will defend Al Zahbi with our lives.
1�The mercenaries also have an important role in protecting the Empire. Do not forget that.
1�The Astral Candescence is the Empress's treasure, the hope of our nation, and the bond between us...
1� ... I must stay here for the capital's defense... So I beg of you, please recapture the Astral Candescence for Aht Urhgan!
1� , you are here to lend your strength to our defenses?
1�Then let us drive back the beastmen, shoulder to shoulder!
1�You are the adventurer who saved me, are you not?I have been waiting to meet again so I could give you thi
1�Would you be so kind as to deliver her to  [the entrance to the Gustav Tunnel (B-8)/Bibiki Bay (G-10)/the entrance of Uggalepih Temple (J-11)]?
1�Hello...Y-you see, I...I'm t-training in the art of magic...
1�I-I've been practicing a s-spell that will tele...trans...send people to the faraway land of Jeuno...
1�W-would you like to be one of my t-test subjects?
1�Be a test subject?Sounds like fun.Are you crazy?
1�R-really!?Y-you're very b-brav
e!�P-probably best if you c-close your eyes.
..�Oops.
1�W-well, I don't b-blame you...I w-wish I was as s-skilled as my brother...
1�You saved me earlier! Thank you very much! You can have this...for fre
..�I-I'm terribly s-sorry...I s-seem to be out of m-magic.M-maybe you can h-help me out another t-time...?
1�There's something foul in the air of late. Can you not feel it?It is the ��true darkness.��
1�Could it be that I am the only soul who senses this wickedness...?
1�I must have a charm to ward away this ultimate evil.

 	)��������...Make haste!

1�Thank you! This should hold the darkness at bay...if only for a while. Bring more, if you can.
1�You saved me from my shadowy prison. Thank you. I have no wards against the darkness now, so I am afraid you must settle with thi
1�See the dashing Elvaan over there? He's the Skyserpent General Rughadjeen, noble commander of the Serpent Generals.
1�Originally, mercenaries like you would not be allowed in his presence. Only speak to him if you have important business, and mind your manners.
1�This is a very trying time for our nation...
1�Not long ago, the Serpent General Commander Rughadjeen went missing during a battle.
1�There is no need for one such as you to get caught up in our nation's problems. You should return to your lands while you still can.
1�Have you found the item we spoke of?
1�I'm sorry, but I'm on duty.We will talk later at the teahouse.
1�I'm on duty.
1�(Wait at the teahouse. I'll make my way there once my shift is over.)
1�The fearless Hume over there is the Flameserpent General Gadalar, champion of the Imperial Army.
1�He tore through the enemy lines in the battle against the Far East with the ferocity of a marid. You should stay away from him if you want to live a long life.
1�I hate to be the bringer of bad news, but Flameserpent General Gadalar vanished in the fray of a recent battle here in the Imperial capital...
1�We were hopelessly outnumbered... No matter how fiercely we raged and how bravely we sliced through the enemy's ranks, it still was not enough.
1�Just look at that girl. Isn't she cute? Her name is Mihli Aliapoh.Don't let her looks fool you, though... She's the Springserpent General!
1�They say she comes from a nation that is allied to the Empire, and that she is working hard to fulfill her homeland's expectations. I'm behind her all the way!
1�Sh-she's gone... Mihli Aliapoh was taken right from my side as I was fighting... I wasn't strong enough...
1�I...I couldn't protect her...
1�See the giant Galka over there? He's the pride of our army--the great Stoneserpent General Zazarg.
1�He has an incredible amount of battle experience. He slumbers and eats together with us soldiers, and openly speaks his mind. He is a kind and reliable commander.
1�The great Stoneserpent General Zazarg... Deep inside, I believed nothing could defeat him...
1�But I will not give up. I will conquer my sadness, and defend the Empress and her Empire to the very last man! I am sure that Zazarg would desire for me to do so.
1�What is it, mercenary?
1�You have an introduction from Biyaada?Ah, you're here to weasel some stories out of me for that ��Saga of the Skyserpent�� everyone's been talking about.
1�Hehehe.I knew someone would come poking around sooner or later.
1�I mean, how could you compose a ballad about the Serpent Generals and leave out the mighty Zazarg?
1�Head on back to the Shararat Teahouse--I'll come by once my stint on the wall is done.
1�Hey, you!You better not step a fraction closer to Lady Najelith.
1�Commander Najelith may be young, but she is one of the greatest bowmasters in all of Urhguum. She is also the great General of the Galeserpent. You must act with dignity and respect around her.
1�The great Najelith has been taken by the enemy!
1�We may still have a chance, though. The beastmen are known to capture anyone that might be of use and keep them as prisoners...
1�Hm?You have some questions about General Najelith?
1�Impudent dog.Did you think I'd sell her secrets to the first rumormonger to flash his coin purse?
1�No?You're here with an introduction from Biyaada?
1�And you mean to immortalize our Galeserpent General in song!?It's about time she was honored with a proper tribute!
1�I would suggest speaking with the general herself. She's much more approachable than you might expect.
1�You'll often find her in the Wajaom Woodlands during her off-duty hours.
1�People say she spends her time there staring sadly at some arrow...
1�It has me slightly worried, to tell the truth.

1�Do you want me to teach you about your Mog House again, kupo?
1�Ask about your Mog House again?Don't ask.Ask.
1�So I'll teach you about each one of them! Ask me what you want to know about, kupo!
1�Choose the Mog House command you want to know about, kupo!
1�What do you want to know about?The Mog Safe.Storage.The Delivery Box.Changing jobs.Gardening.Changing the layout.Mog House invitations.I got it, thanks, kupo!
1�The Mog Safe is where I keep items that you can't carry! It's an especially secure and solid safe, kupo!
1�You can only put so many items in it, kupo... But I'll guard them even if it means my life, kupo!
1�Storage space becomes available when you place furniture in your Mog House using the ��Layout�� command, kupo!
1�It's almost exactly the same as using your Mog Safe, kupo!Leave your items here for me to look after, kupo!
1�The Delivery Box is where you can send letters to friends and receive items from various places, kupo!
1�You should take the items from your Delivery Box and put them in your inventory when they arrive, kupo!
1�If your Delivery Box is full, no more deliveries can be made, and you can't send any mail either, kupo!
1�You can send items and gil to your friends with the ��Send�� command, kupo!
1�(Sometimes, if a special force takes hold, you can even deliver items with the "Exclusive" attribute, kupo...!)
1�Changing people's jobs is a secret ability only we moogles can use, kupo!
1�And...the rest is a secret, kupo!
1�All moogles like taking care of plants, kupo!
1�As long as you have a flowerpot and seeds, I'll make it my personal responsibility to look after the plants you raise, kupo!
1�This Mog House is your very own room, kupo! But it's still a little bare, kupo...
1�It needs some furniture and maybe some paintings to make it more cozy, kupo!
1�If you find any during your travels, I'll help you lay them out, kupo! I can't wait, kupo!
1�Each item of furniture you place using the ��Layout�� command corresponds to a different element, kupo! The type of energy that envelops your Mog House changes depending on those elements, kupo!
1�When that energy changes, my powers change as well, kupo! Master, you should try placing all sorts of furniture in your Mog House, kupo!
1�You can invite party and alliance members into your Mog House, kupo!
1�You can show off your expensive furniture, have tea parties, plan your next great adventure--the possibilities are endless, kupo!
1�Are you sure, kupo? You know everything about your Mog House, kupo?
1�Are you sure?I'm sure!Maybe I'm not so sure...
1�And finally, a little bit of advice!
1�If you ever run into any problems, just ask your fellow adventurers for help!
1�If you type ��/ae Hello!��, then your message will be heard by many people.
1�If you type ��/ae�� followed by your issue or question, other adventurers will help you!
1�Remember that you can only do this while in town, kupo!
1�Welcome, Master! This is your home, the ��Mog House,�� kupo!
1�I'm a moogle! We moogles like taking care of houses and items! Nice to meet you, kupo!
1�I'll tell you all about your Mog House, kupo!
1�First, the basics, kupo!Open your main menu, Master. The button at the very bottom changes to ��Mog House�� when you're in your Mog House, kupo!
1�Press it and the ��Mog House�� menu will appear! Everything you can do in your Mog House is there, kupo!
1�There are lots of things you can do in your Mog House, kupo! It can be too much for some masters, kupo...
1�Okay, kupo!Good luck on your adventuring, kupo!
1�Master!I traveled all the way here at your bidding, kupo! Even a Rent-a-Room needs a moogle, kupo!
1�But there are a few things you can't do in a Rent-a-Room, kupo. Select ��Mog House�� from the main menu and check, kupo!
1�Master!I have something to tell you, kupo!
1�I found this precious item under the #���� pillow, kupo!
1�It's all yours, kupo!
1�I used the #���� to write a song for you, kupo!
1�Here, kupo! Please think of the lonely moogle waiting for you back home when you hear this song, kupo!
1�I found this item in the back of one of the #����'s drawers, kupo!
1�It's all yours, kupo!
1�I found this in the back of the #����, kupo!
1�It must be a gift from the heavens, kupo!Here, take it, kupo!
1�I found this item inside the #����, kupo!
1�Luck is on your side, kupo!Take it, kupo!
1�I fished this item out of the #����, kupo!
1�It was very hard work, kupo...I'm very tired, kupo...
1�I found this behind the #���� painting, kupo!
1�This must be what they mean when they say, there are many mysteries behind works of art, kupo!It's all yours, kupo!
1�Something clattered inside the #���� when I shook it! Look what fell out when I turned it upside down, kupo!
1�It's all yours, kupo!
1�I felt there was something strange about the #����, and when I looked into it, I found this, kupo!
1�We moogles have very good intuition, kupo!It's all yours, kupo!
1�Look what I found in your #����!

1�What do you wish to know about?Nothing.Sanction.Imperial Standing.Besieged.
1���Sanction�� is a magic spell that we use to observe and assess mercenaries' actions.
1�Defeating enemies while you have Sanction cast on you will raise your Imperial Standing. Also, the stronger the monsters you fight, the higher your Imperial Standing will become.
1�When fighting in a beastman stronghold that has taken the Astral Candescence, your Imperial Standing will rise by a significant amount as thanks for your participation in the recovery effort.
1�Sanction is also necessary in order to receive crystals from the enemies you defeat.
1�But you must take caution. Stepping too far out of the Empire's boundaries will cause Sanction to wear off.
1�You can raise your Imperial Standing by defeating enemies while you have Sanction cast on you.
1�Saving a captured prisoner in a beastman stronghold and submitting archaic mirrors to Imperial guards will also result in an increased Imperial Standing.
1�You can view your Imperial Standing by selecting ��Besieged�� under ��Region Info.��
1�You can also speak to me at any time to exchange your Imperial Standing credits for items.
1�What about Besieged?Never mind.Besieged basics.��Serpent Generals.��Astral Candescence in Al Zahbi.Astral Candescence with beastmen.Empire's current state of defense.
1���Besieged�� occurs when the beastman armies breach the walls of Al Zahbi.
1�Everyone in town who is capable of wielding a weapon is called to action to defend Al Zahbi alongside the Imperial Army.
1�The beastmen's main purpose is to enter the Hall of Binding and wrest the ��Astral Candescence�� from the Empire's control.
1�You need not know what the Astral Candescence is.
1�All you must know is that it is your duty to protect the five Serpent Generals who hold the keys to the Hall of Binding, and to drive the beastman hordes from the Imperial capital.
1�The Empire's safety and its future rest on your capable shoulders!Rest assured that you will be rewarded for your efforts.
1�The Empire's defense is entrusted to five generals.
1�Each possesses a name corresponding to the symbols of the Empire--the serpents of flame, water, stone, gales, and sky.
1�Furthermore, the mirrors used to open the Hall of Binding are divided among their possession. Thus, the generals' fates determine the tide of battle.
1�If all five generals should fall in battle, the Hall of Binding will open, and the beastmen will be able to seize the Astral Candescence.
1�It is your responsibility to prevent such a disaster from happening. We are depending on you!
1�When the Astral Candescence is safely resting on its plinth in the Hall of Binding, it emanates waves that bestow special bonuses to Sanction.
1�The first bonus is a slight boost to the amount of experience points received from battles. You will receive this effect simply by having Sanction cast on you.
1�There are several other bonus effects, but you must sacrifice some of your Imperial Standing credits in order to receive them.
1�Keep in mind that the bonuses become more powerful with the number of times the Imperial capital is successfully defended.
1�Sanction's strength will reset if the beastmen succeed in invading the Hall of Binding, though.
1�The waves emanating from the Astral Candescence in Al Zahbi bring a multitude of blessings to all of us. You must not let it fall into the hands of the beastmen!

1�If the beastmen manage to take the Astral Candescence, its recovery will become our top priority. Find the coveted item on a plinth in one of the beastman strongholds and seize it back for the Empire!
1�We aren't quite sure what the beastmen are scheming to do with such power, but we do know that the Astral Candescence's waves can increase the beastmen's strength.
1�As if that weren't enough, we have recent reports that the beastmen have set ��archaic mirrors�� in their strongholds to magnify the power of the waves.
1�If you should come across any archaic mirrors, take them immediately and trade them to an Imperial guard.

 �[victory/victories] overall, and the Astral Candescence has been seized by the beastmen a total of

1�Have you heard about the late Emperor Jalzahn?
1�You have heard...A few things....about who?
1�Then you must have been in shock when he passed away. It was all so sudden...

1�He was one of those rare leaders whose will lined up with that of the people. Compared to him, the current Empress is...well, just a little less agreeable, shall we say? Do not mention so to anyone else, though...
1�You have never heard of Emperor Jalzahn!?He was Emperor until four years ago, when he left the mortal realm. His wife followed him shortly thereafter.

1�During their lifetimes, the Emperor and Empress often mingled with the people of the Empire, even coming as far as the Commoners' Ward for visits. They were greatly loved by the public, and we always looked forward to seeing them...
1�The Astral Candescence gives off a melody called the Astral Wind, unperceivable by the mortal ear.
1�How I would love to hear its heavenly chime one day... I wonder if there is a way...
1�That place is called the ��Hall of Binding.�� The door is always closed, and the place gives everyone the creeps. They say that a great treasure called the ��Astral Candescence�� is kept there.
1�Being so secretive just makes people more curious, though...
1�That place is called the ��Hall of Binding.�� The door is always closed, and the place gives everyone the creeps. They say that a great treasure called the ��Astral Candescence�� is kept there.
1�Right now, it looks like you can go in and have a peek.Not that it's worth it. There's just some big pillar, with no treasure in sight...
1�I heard a scary-wary story-wory the other day! You see, a long time ago, the Imperial Army went to fight against the Lamiae on Arrapago Reef...
1�And they brought a whole bunchy-wunch of automatons to help them fight... I'm still shiver-wivering...
1�But then comes the reeeally scary part. The battle automatons were charmed by the Lamiae...
1�Isn't that frighty-wightening? Every last one went crazy for the Lamiae!
1�I don't want to imagine my Truffle being crazy about anyone but me... I think my hearty-weart would just bursty-wurst!
1�So I've decided to never, ever go near Arrapago Reef. Anyway, I heard Lamiae can charm Tarutaru, too!
1�You better look out too, okay? It's a danger-wangerous world we live in.
1�Lamiae. Scary-wary.
1�Only a joke.Truffle does not know what Lamiae are.
1�Empress Nashmeira II appeared at the palace seemingly out of nowhere, and now she reigns over the Empire.
1�Since she took the throne, not a single good thing has happened. Beastman raids are a bronze piece a dozen and nobody feels safe walking the streets of Al Zahbi anymore...
1�I have heard that she has absolutely no interest in governmental matters, as well. What is to become of our nation?
1�Until about two hundred years ago, this land belonged to a nation called the ��Kingdom of Ephramad,�� which prospered in the shipping trade.
1�Trade between Ephramad and the West flourished until their tiny nation began to equal the Aht Urhgan Empire in wealth and the size of their navy.

1�The rivalry between the two nations reached a critical point, and the Imperial Army used a power no man should even possess... The Kingdom of Ephramad was completely destroyed. I find the Empire's actions absolutely deplorable...
1�My homeland, the Marquisate of Tavnazia, was destroyed in a beastman attack roughly twenty years ago. I was in Al Zahbi at the time...
1�Although we were allies, the former Emperor threw the ambassador out of town without so much as a word of condolence. I have never seen such a disgrace in my entire life!
1�Since Grand Vizier Razfahd began working to restore peace on the streets of the Imperial capital, Al Zahbi has been gradually changing for the better.
1�The beastman invasions are still the same, but theft and other crimes have gone down. Thanks to the Grand Vizier, business is better than ever!
1�My younger brother went missing after a beastman attack once. I was sure I would never see his smiling face again...
1�But the other day, I got a letter from him! Would you like to hear what it says? Just listen!
1���To my dear sister,Don't worry about me. The Mamool Ja are treating me like a king. I've got everything I ever wanted!
1���Mamook is a paradise. I'm so glad I studied blacksmithing!��
1�I've decided to forget about my brother. There's just one thing I'm still curious about, though...
1�What is he using his blacksmithing skills to make there?
1�Thwee cheers for the Empwess!
1�Don't I sound stwong? Just like an Imper-eel soldier, wight?
1�Imper-eels are weally cool, but Serpent Generals are even cooler!
1�Someday I wanna see them do their magic. They can make a ��seal,�� you know? I don't know what that is, but I'd like to see it!
1�But whenever I twy, my papa wuns after me and dwags me back home without any supper...
1�I simply cannot bring myself to like the whole idea of working as a mercenary for mere riches.
1�Perhaps I am just biased, but I cannot help but feel that mercenaries lack the conviction to protect this town.
1�The volunteer soldiers seem very admirable in comparison. They risk their very lives to protect the town where they were raised!
1�Such nice boys and girls... I'd like to bake them a pie.
1�Aht Urhgan, land of the courageous...
1�I used to have confidence in my strength, and I came to this nation to test my skill. But you could not pay me enough to face the ferocious beastmen here...
1�Still, I can't go running home now, or everyone will think I am a coward! How do I get myself into these messes...?

1�This is the West Gate.A short walk outside, and you will come to the Wajaom Woodlands. You will meet many beasts outside of town, so make sure you are prepared.

1�This ��Bastion�� is the best place in town to stage a defensive against invading beastmen. During an attack, we retreat to this area and bring the savages down as they rush in from the drawbridges.
